systable.tableexist: select name from MSysObjects where name='#tablename'

nclog.detailtable: create table #tablename (id counter,callid varchar(40), userid varchar(40),thread varchar(100), host varchar(100),port varchar(20), ts varchar(100),remotecall varchar(200),debuglevel varchar(50), msg memo,costtime float,flowsize float,rowcount float,defcol varchar(100),defcol1 varchar(100),defcol2 varchar(100),server varchar(100), filename varchar(200) ,CONSTRAINT rr PRIMARY KEY (id))
nclog.summarytable: create table #tablename (id counter,server varchar(100),callid varchar(40), remoteCallMethod varchar(100),remoteAddr varchar(50),userid varchar(50), thread varchar(100),begintime varchar(40),costtime float, sqlcosttime float,readrownum float,readresulttime float,writetoclienttime float, writetoclientbytes float,readfromclientbytes float,notclosedconnectioncount float ,CONSTRAINT rr PRIMARY KEY (id))

cpulog.cputable: create table #tablename (server varchar(40),host varchar(50),ts varchar(100),cpuid varchar(40), user float,sys varchar(10),wait float,idle float,file varchar(200))

memorylog.memorytable: create table #tablename (server varchar(40),host varchar(50),ts varchar(100),total float, free float,pi float,po float,file varchar(200))

jvmlog.jvmtable: create table #tablename (server varchar(40),servername varchar(40),ts varchar(100),max float, total float,free float,ratio varchar(40),msg memo, wcthreadnum float,servicethreadnum float,wcrange varchar(40),respcost varchar(10), file varchar(200))

messagelog.message: create table message(ts varchar(30),snapshotid varchar(30),message memo, service varchar(100),snapshotfile varchar(100),server varchar(50),file varchar(100))
messagelog.snapshot: create table snapshot(snapshotid varchar(30),filename varchar(100),content memo)

operatormap.operator: create table operator(cuserid varchar(30),user_name varchar(50),user_code varchar(50),domain varchar(50))
